description: The provisional description can be translated from French to English:In this procurement the National Defense Department got the bid for supplying MMI technical Racks and universal shelvings. Although English and French are accepted as bid languages in this, bidders need to submit their proposals in prefered official language to be able to further business with the government. ",
tags: electronic hardware and component parts and accessories
full_summary:
================ Ortiz Surveying Consulting - Government Tender Announcement
=====================================================


### Tender Brief

#### Notice Reference Number
W8485-247932/A

#### Solicitation Type
Request for Proposal (RFP)

#### Subject
Pelican™ MAC Rack™ 4U Case and Universal Rack Mount Shelf

#### Description
The Department of National Defence has a requirement for various items, to be delivered to Ottawa. The deadline for submission and delivery is 19 January 2024.

The items can be categorized into two main products:

* **Pelican 4U MAC Rack 4U Rack Mount Case**
	+ Part Number: MR1909-02/29/05
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ National Stock Number (NSN): 8145
* **Universal Rack Mount Shelf**
	+ Part Number: RASV190318BK1
	+ Quantity: 10
	+ Unit of Issue: Each
	+ National Stock Number (NSN): 5975

Bidder Responsibilities
-----------------------

In order to be considered for the contract, bidders must ensure the submitted products meet the specified requirements.

*   The technical specifications of the submitted product must be equivalent to or better than the listed specifications.
*   For equivalent or substitute products, the bidder must specify the brand name and model number as well as the national stock number.

### Tender Evaluation

Tenders will be evaluated based on the lowest total price for the goods. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

### Tender Deadlines

The tender closes on 7 December 2023 at 14:00, and deliveries are expected to be made on or before 19 January 2024.

### Contact Information

For any questions or concerns, please contact:
Linda Voyer
Email: [linda.voyer@forces.gc.ca](mailto:linda.voyer@forces.gc.ca)
### Sources Used:

*   This announcement is available for download from the [Canada Border Services Agency](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/)
*   Tender documents are available in either English or French.

#### Service Standard

The service standard for this contract is to award it on a competitive basis with preference to Canadian suppliers.
